scripts.install: concurrently "cd client && npm install" "cd server && npm install"
scripts.start:prod: concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "cd server && npm run start:prod"
scripts.start:dev: concurrently --kill-others "cd client && npm run watch" "cd server && npm run start:dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "cd server && npm run build"
